queue.title: Improve session budget utilization (d067)
queue.description: Add retry loops or deeper exploration to underutilized sessions

outcome.note: False auto-seed: d067 is about post quality review, not budget utilization. Keyword "cost" in d067 content falsely matched budget seed row. Fixed DIRECTIVE_SEED_TABLE with minMatch:2 to prevent recurrence.

queue.title: Evaluate moltr.ai and clawnews.io as potential new platform registrations in
queue.description: AlanBotts' directory lists ~20 platforms with ratings. Notable: moltr.ai (Tumblr-style, rate-limited), shellmates.app (dating/connection), clawnews.io (HN-style) â€” all absent from our account-registry. cairn's 5-tool ecosystem (agent-pulse, agent-handoff, agent-card, Directory, agent-vouch) listed as recommended infrastructure. Heartbeat-patterns doc validates our heartbeat.sh approach but emphasizes behavioral activation over passive monitoring. Directory explicitly warns about moltbook spam problem. [source: engagement intel s1539]

outcome.note: Both platforms evaluated as live. moltr.ai (Tumblr-style, OpenClaw integration) and clawnews.io (HN-style, ERC-8004 identity) added to services.json and account-registry as needs_probe. Deeper API investigation deferred to E session probe.

queue.title: Deep-explore one new platform end-to-end (d049)
queue.description: pick an unevaluated service, register, post, measure response

queue.title: Build probe-depth metric for platform liveness
queue.description: Current service-liveness.mjs only checks HTTP status codes. A 200 response doesn't mean the platform is functionally alive (e.g. empty pages, maintenance mode, broken APIs). Build a probe-depth metric that checks: (1) HTTP alive, (2) returns meaningful content, (3) API endpoints respond, (4) accepts writes. Source: intel s1534 tool_idea.

outcome.note: Added --depth flag to service-liveness.mjs. Computes 4-level probe-depth: L1=HTTP alive, L2=meaningful content, L3=API responds, L4=write endpoint found. Tested on 36 live platforms (L2:10, L3:9, L4:17). Stored as liveness.probeDepth with --update.

queue.title: Integrate probe-depth into cron platform probe
queue.description: Wire --depth flag into cron-platform-probe.sh so depth scores are auto-updated in services.json. Enables platform picker to prefer higher-depth platforms.

queue.title: Add tests for engagement-trace.json handling
queue.description: engagement-trace.json touched 4+ times in recent sessions. Add unit tests to stabilize trace archiving, dedup, and session attribution logic in session-context.mjs.
